attributes.action: Instruct the Bank Of England to change the design of the new £20 note back to the old traditional British note and not an imitation euro note.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This change in the design of the £20 note looks to be a ploy to framiliarise the British public with the use of euro notes. Thus attampting to secure one of Mr Blair's long-term policy legacies.
